price: Wala wamchao Mungu hawana jukumu lolote kwao, lakini ni kukumbusha, asaa wapate kujiepusha.
arabic: وَمَا عَلَى ٱلَّذِينَ يَتَّقُونَ مِنۡ حِسَابِهِم مِّن شَيۡءٖ وَلَٰكِن ذِكۡرَىٰ لَعَلَّهُمۡ يَتَّقُونَ
footnotes: Na wenye kumcha Mwenyezi Mungu hawana dhambi katika dhambi za hawa madhaalimu, ikiwa wataendelea na upotovu wao. Lakini yapasa kuwasemeza na kuwakumbusha, asaa huenda wakaiogopa adhabu ya Mwenyezi Mungu, na wakaacha upotovu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: wamā ʿalā alladhīna yattaqūna min ḥisābihim min shayin walākin dhik'rā laʿallahum yattaqūna
